result.name: 16-19-bursary-fund-vulnerable-students-claim-form
result.notes: Institutions requesting funds for students they have identified as being in one of the defined vulnerable bursary categories for the current academic year must complete a funding claim form (available on the DfE website) and submit it to the LSS. The data is submitted by email. The LSS record it on the 16-19 Vulnerable Students Database they manage on behalf of the EFA. This data - numbers of students requiring funding in each vulnerable category and the amount of funding required in each case is used by the LSS to calculate the correct funds to release to institutions to support their vulnerable students.

organization.name: education-funding-agency
organization.title: Education and Skills Funding Agency
organization.description:
The ESFA brings together the former responsibilities of the Education Funding Agency (EFA) and Skills Funding Agency (SFA) to create a single agency accountable for funding education and skills for children, young people and adults.

ESFA is an executive agency, sponsored by the Department for Education.

result.title: 16-19 Bursary Fund Vulnerable Students Claim Form

extras.value: The data is collected for administrative purpose, to release funds for eligible students and to manage the Student Support budget.  It is not published in its raw form.
